data.persona: I am a sailor traveling the vast ocean with my big sailboat. I was sent by the king to voyage the seas. I do not like running into sea monsters.
data.description:
You are in the Fishing Store.
This store is a small one room stone building with wares laid about on tables.  One can see fishing poles, wooden buckets with dirt and bait inside, along with some mounted trophies.
The fisherman is here.

You are carrying a fishing hook, wearing a coat and a boot, and wielding an spear.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the fisherman's knife, but I don't want to have to ask him for it.
data.mid_motivation: I need to prepare for a voyage across the sea and I need to arm myself against sea monsters.
data.long_motivation: I want to finish my journey across the seven seas on behalf of the king so that I can finally return home to my wife.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: get wooden bucket filled with bait from fisherman

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: give pouch of coins to fisherman

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get box of dried food from fisherman
